title: EKKO LOOKS SO F****** SICK!!!!!!
body:
For starters, FINALLY a mid laner! The only Mid laner that's been released since I started playing League was Azir... I find Azir ridiculously boring. Good for this current meta since Sustained Damage > Burst Damage against tanks but boring and quite weak I found.

BUT THIS GUY HOLY SHIT I LOVE HIS KIT MORE THAN ANYTHING EVER. This is the ONLY champ that I'm certain I'll be buying outright ON release. 

How does everyone reckon his ult work? Do you press R at a certain time and place and then return to that place 4 seconds LATER? Or just press R at any given time and return to wherever you were 4 seconds ago and hope you return to a good spot?

But srsly FINALLY!!!!!

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/champion-reveal-ekko-boy-who-shattered-time

replies.body:
You'll have an evanescent copy of yourself following you at 4 seconds distance (and a thin thread linking his path to yours). When you press the ult, you "rewind" to his position instantly, and deal area damage.

Also, it was meant to be a toplaner... But then again so was Vi. RiotGypsy does that sometimes.
